mapper.update: update doctor set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hospital = #{hospital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, department = #{department,jdbcType=INTEGER}, professiona = #{professiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, hospital,status, department, professiona, description from doctor

select d.id as doctorId,d.status as status, d.user_id as userId, d.hospital as hospital, d.department as department, d.professiona as professiona, d.description as description,u.real_name as realName,u.head_portrait as headPortrait, u.sex as sex from doctor d LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id=d.user_id where hospital = #{code,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status= 1
select status as status from application WHERE patient_id= #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT} LIMIT 1

select d.id as doctorId, d.user_id as userId, d.hospital as hospital, d.department as department, d.professiona as professiona, d.description as description,u.real_name as realName,u.head_portrait as headPortrait, u.sex as sex from doctor d LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id=d.user_id where d.id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
